column4: I have lubuntu 12.10 installed. In the previous version i.e. 12.04 pressing the 'windows' key used to bring up lxde menu, but that doesn't seem to work in 12.10. How do I make windows key to pop lxde menu up?
Try alt + space ... google next time one second result..
Alt+F1 or Ctl+Escape are the keybindings for opening the main menu.
